function.name: ftpUpload
function.description: Adds an FTP Upload build step. @see FTPUpload

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.deployer.targetUrl
param.description: An FTP server (use a hostname or IP address) and a remote directory (relative to the FTP user's home).

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.deployer.ftp.securityMode
param.description: Choose between an insecure and a secure connection (FTPS, FTPES).

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.deployer.ftp.dataChannelProtection
param.description: Choose a data protection scheme if FTPS or FTPES is used.

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.deployer.ftp.transferMethod
param.description: Optional. An FTP transfer mode to force.

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.deployer.sourcePath
param.description: Newline- or comma-separated paths to files/directories to be deployed. Ant-style wildcards like dir/**/*.zip and target directories like *.zip => winFiles,unix/distro.tgz => linuxFiles, where winFiles and linuxFiles are target directories, are supported.

example.description: Adds an FTP Upload build step with FTPS security connection mode, private protection mode, authentication via username and password, binary transfer mode and active FTP mode. See options in [documentation](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?FTP+Upload).
example.code: ftpUpload { name = "My FTP Upload step" targetUrl = "8.8.8.8" securityMode = FTPUpload.SecurityMode.FTPS dataChannelProtection = FTPUpload.DataChannelProtectionMode.PRIVATE authMethod = usernameAndPassword { username = "username" password = "credentialsJSON:******" } ftpMode = FTPUpload.FTPMode.ACTIVE transferMode = FTPUpload.TransferMode.BINARY sourcePath = """ dir/**/*.zip *.zip => winFiles unix/distro.tgz => linuxFile """.trimIndent() }
